subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Since a 1-point loss to the Detroit Pistons on Dec. 26 that ended on a controversial call, the Nets have won four of six games and appear to be playing closer to preseason expectations.
snippet: Since a 1-point loss to the Detroit Pistons on Dec. 26 that ended on a controversial call, the Nets have won four of six games and appear to be playing closer to preseason expectations.
